name: Terrifying 911
description: Terrifying 911 is unofficial port of Metal Slug 1. The game contains 6 levels. Also, the game is featured an opening FMV containing actual footage of the World Trade Center's twin towers being attacked.
publishedBy: Dongguan Hi-Tech Computer Learning Machine Co., Ltd.
developedBy: Dongguan Hi-Tech Computer Learning Machine Co., Ltd.

releases.publisher: Dongguan Hi-Tech Computer Learning Machine Co., Ltd.
releases.developer: Dongguan Hi-Tech Computer Learning Machine Co., Ltd.
